## Conclusion

### Impacts

- Significant warming in March and June
- ~3 degrees/100 years
- If trend continues...
    - Increase Heat-related public health impacts
    - Increase in A/C costs
    - Earlier planting of crops (increase yields?)
    - Hotter summer Temps (lower yields?)
